title: 1RM Calculator
description: Estimate your one-rep max from weight and reps, then review training percentages.

helper.formula: Uses the average of the Epley and Brzycki formulas.
helper.disclaimer: Treat this as an estimate and train within a safe range.

result.placeholder: Enter weight and repetitions to calculate.
